BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF LONG ISLAND INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF LONG ISLAND IS A NONPROFIT, ECUMENCIAL CHRISTIAN HOUSING MINISTRY THAT WORKS IN PARTNERSHIP WITH GOD AND PEOPLE EVERYWHERE, FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE, TO DEVELOP COMMUNITIES WITH PEOPLE IN NEED BY BUILDING AND RENOVATING HOUSES SO THAT THERE ARE DECENT HOUSES IN DECENT COMMUNITIES IN WHICH EVERY PERSON CAN EXPERIENCE GOD'S LOVE AND CAN LIVE AND GROW INTO ALL THAT GOD INTENDS.HABITAT SEEKS TO ELIMINATE POVERTY HOUSING AND HOMELESSNESS FROM THE WORLD, AND TO MAKE DECENT SHELTER A MATTER OF CONSCIENCE AND ACTION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF LONG ISLAND IS A NONPROFIT, ECUMENCIAL CHRISTIAN HOUSING MINISTRY THAT WORKS IN PARTNERSHIP WITH GOD AND PEOPLE EVERYWHERE, FROM ALL WALKS OF LIFE, TO DEVELOP COMMUNITIES WITH PEOPLE IN NEED BY BUILDING AND RENOVATING HOUSES SO THAT THERE ARE DECENT HOUSES IN DECENT COMMUNITIES IN WHICH EVERY PERSON CAN EXPERIENCE GOD'S LOVE AND CAN LIVE AND GROW INTO ALL THAT GOD INTENDS.HABITAT SEEKS TO ELIMINATE POVERTY HOUSING AND HOMELESSNESS FROM THE WORLD, AND TO MAKE DECENT SHELTER A MATTER OF CONSCIENCE AND ACTION.
IRS990.Desc: HABITAT BUILDS HOUSES FOR LOW-INCOME FAMILIES. HOUSES ARE FINANCED BY EITHER HABITAT THROUGH THE USE OF INTEREST-FREE LOANS OR THROUGH A LOW-INTEREST LOAN FROM SONYMA. THE BUILT HOMES ARE EVENTUALLY SOLD TO QUALIFIED, LOW-INCOME FAMILIES. FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023, THERE WAS $120,000 OF HOMEBUYER GRANT SUBSIDIES PROVIDED TO THE HOMEOWNERS TOWARDS THE PURCHASE OF THE HOMES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RESTORE INTENDS TO REMOVE BUILDING MATERIALS FROM THE WASTE STREAM AND OFFER THEM TO THE PUBLIC AT GREATLY-REDUCED PRICES. FOR THE YEAR ENDED JUNE 30, 2023, RESTORE SALES TOTALED $1,767,673.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNMENT RELATIONS WORK BEFORE THE STATE, AND THE COUNTIES OF NASSAU AND SUFFOLK TO EDUCATE, AND PROMOTE HFHLI'S MISSION, AND ADDRESS QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS REGARDING HFHLI'S AFFORDABLE DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: INVENTORY OF HOMES FOR SALE OR LEASE

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION EVALUATED FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AND HAS DETERMINED THAT THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS FOR 2023 AND 2022.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION PROVIDED THE FORM 990 TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL BEFORE FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS REVIEW AND DISCUSSES THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND OTHER POLICIES AS RELATED TO OUR ANNUAL QUALITY ASSURANCE DOCUMENTATION FOR OUR AFFILIATE STATUS WITH HABITAT FOR HUMANITY INTERNATIONAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION AND ANY SALARY ADJUSTMENTS FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ARE DETERMINED BY THE EXECUTIVE BOARD. THE COMPENSATION OF OTHER EMPLOYEES WITHIN THE ORGANIZATION IS REVIEWED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR/CEO.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATIONS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE AT THE ORGANIZATIONS ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICE DURING BUSINESS HOURS. IN ADDITION, THE 990 IS AVAILABLE ON THE GUIDESTAR WEBSITE.
THE AUDIT COMMITTEE OVERSEES ALL ASPECTS OF THE AUDIT ENGAGEMENT.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: TO ELIMINATE POVERTY BY PROVIDING SIMPLE, DECENT SHELTER TO THOSE IN NEED.
